content.value: I will be happy to work on a non-trivial project, developing a complex frontend on React. Last year I studied and put into practice a bunch of cool things from the web. I only do front end, but I can take projects with my colleague on fullstack development. I'm working with:  React/Redux/Effector Vue/Vuex GraphQl Webpack HTML CSS/SASS Antd/Tailwind/Bootstrap Webpack Git.
